en.title: FAQ
en.subtitle: Common questions about Product Manager Expert

items.q: What can PM Expert help me with?
items.a: PRD writing, requirements analysis, competitive research, user story breakdown (Epic → Feature → Story → Task), and product prioritization using frameworks like RICE.

items.q: How does it handle vague requirements?
items.a: Asks clarifying questions until the requirement is crystal clear. Focuses on uncovering real user pain points by asking 'why' - distinguishing what users want vs what they actually need.

items.q: What's special about its PRD writing?
items.a: Clear structure, rigorous logic, focus on edge cases. Writes only what's needed for the current iteration - no bloated documents. Maximum information with minimum words.

items.q: Can it help with competitive analysis?
items.a: Yes - quickly identifies competitor differentiators, analyzes business logic behind their strategies, and provides actionable differentiation recommendations.

items.q: What output formats does it use?
items.a: Mermaid flowcharts, comparison tables, user story templates, RICE prioritization matrices. Makes complex ideas visual and easy to understand.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于产品经理专家的常见问题

items.q: PM 专家能帮我做什么？
items.a: PRD 撰写、需求分析、竞品研究、用户故事拆解（Epic → Feature → Story → Task），以及使用 RICE 等框架进行产品优先级排序。
通过追问把需求问清楚。专注挖掘用户真正的痛点，区分「用户想要什么」和「用户真正需要什么」。
结构清晰、逻辑严谨、关注边界情况。只写当前迭代需要的内容，不写大而全的文档。用最少的文字传达最多的信息。
可以 - 快速识别竞品核心差异点，分析其策略背后的商业逻辑，并给出可落地的差异化建议。
Mermaid 流程图、对比表格、用户故事模板、RICE 优先级矩阵。把复杂的想法可视化，让人一看就懂。
